H0.text: Tony Hadley was the lead singer with which 1980s new romantic band. Duran Duran

H1.text: Tony Hadley was the lead singer with which 1980s new romantic band. The Cure

H2.text: Tony Hadley was the lead singer with which 1980s new romantic band. Depeche Mode

H3.text: Tony Hadley was the lead singer with which 1980s new romantic band. Spandau Ballet

A4.text: The band's classic lineup featured Gary Kemp on guitar, synthesiser and backing vocals; his brother, Martin Kemp, on bass; vocalist Tony Hadley; saxophonist Steve Norman; and drummer John Keeble.

A5.text: The band peaked in popularity in 1983 with the album True, as its title track reached No.
